title: "Sci-Fi Cityscape"
content:
# Welcome to Sci-Fi Cityscape

Explore a futuristic world with towering skyscrapers and advanced technology on our website, Sci-Fi Cityscape. Immerse yourself in the digital illustration of a city on a distant planet that will transport you to another dimension.

Our website is dedicated to showcasing stunning sci-fi art and illustrations from talented artists around the world. From dystopian landscapes to space-age metropolises, we curate the best science fiction artwork for your viewing pleasure.

Whether you're a fan of classic sci-fi movies or cutting-edge digital art, Sci-Fi Cityscape has something for everyone. Join our community of sci-fi enthusiasts and discover new worlds of imagination today.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A digital illustration of a city on a distant planet, with towering buildings and advanced technology."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
